metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2953 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds read in extractImageSection in tools/tiffcrop.c:6905, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 48d6ece8.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
